input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle

Product keywords:
Unique, holiday themed die-casts of favorite cars characters!
Each has festive, seasonal details and colors and comes with a unique Easter basket!
Choice of four vehicles: the Easter buggy, Easter Mater, Easter Lightning McQueen or Easter Ramone. Each sold separately, subject to availability
Perfect for collecting and as a gift for your favorite cars fan's basket!
Collect them all!

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Celebrate Easter with your favorite Disney/Pixar Cars characters! These die-cast vehicles have special details and colors that make them unique, and they come in unique Easter baskets. Choose from Easter Lightning McQueen, Easter Mater, Easter Ramone, or the Easter buggy. Collect them all! They make a great gift for any Cars fan, young or old.
input_text.Response B: Wow! These die-cast Cars characters are so unique and fun for the holiday! This Lightning McQueen has festive, seasonal details and colors and comes with a unique Easter basket! They are so collectible and would make a great gift for your favorite Cars fan. Collect them all before they are gone!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: Covers all information in a concise and appealing way. Could include additional information regarding availability
label_annotations.factors_b: Overuse of ! punctuation detracts from overall message. Less informative than option A
